programme.title: Xploration: Animal Science
programme.desc: In this episode we meet human's closest relatives - primates. See what makes a chimpanzee one of the most intelligent primates. Find out why the spider monkey is such an amazing climber and feel the power of the howler monkey's howl.

programme.title: Xploration: Animal Science
programme.desc: In this episode we'll find out how sharks use electro-sensors to detect their prey. Also, discover the skunk's stinky defense mechanism. And domestic versus wild - see how the striped zebra matches up against its cousin the horse.

programme.title: Deep Undercover

programme.title: Deep Undercover

programme.desc: Bumpy battles a union strike threatening club construction; Elise bails out a fellow Panther; Frank faces consequences for Cowboy Nick's murder.

programme.title: Eye of the Needle
programme.desc: A Nazi spy (Donald Sutherland) seduces the wife (Kate Nelligan) of a crippled pilot (Christopher Cazenove) on the Scottish coast before D-Day.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: When a small outpost gets ambushed during the Vietnam War, a U.S. Army squad takes the battle below ground for a high-stakes mission unlike anything they've ever seen.

programme.title: The Parallax View
programme.desc: A reporter's investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: Demanding the release of a political prisoner, a terrorist and his gang hijack the U.S. president's plane.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: A martial-arts master (Chow Yun-Fat) finds an unlikely protg (Seann William Scott) to take over the responsibility of protecting an ancient scroll.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens, believing actors to be real heroes, enlist cast members of a sci-fi TV series to help save their people.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
programme.desc: Two dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) go back in time to fetch Beethoven, Napoleon and other biggies for a history project.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
programme.desc: The dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) beat the Grim Reaper (William Sadler) in a board-game contest, so he must help them stop their evil robot twins.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music
programme.desc: The ruler of the future tells best friends Bill and Ted they must compose a new song to save life as we know it. But instead of writing it, they decide to travel through time to steal it from their older selves and bring harmony to the universe.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens, believing actors to be real heroes, enlist cast members of a sci-fi TV series to help save their people.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After his new bride reveals her nasty nature, a man (Ben Stiller) meets the woman (Michelle Monaghan) who may be his real soul mate and tries to woo her.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: Torn Hearts
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: The Grifters
programme.desc: A con man (John Cusack) makes a no-win triangle with his mother (Anjelica Huston) and his girlfriend (Annette Bening).

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Sam, Jared, Bryce and Amanda go on a treasure-hunting trip, where they discover a downed airplane full of cocaine alongside a famous shipwreck. Unknown to Sam and Jared, Bryce makes a fatal mistake and decides to sell the cocaine.

programme.title: Small Soldiers

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A daredevil aviator (Jude Law) and an ace reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) fight an evil mastermind and his army of gigantic robots.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A teen awakes within a massive maze with other teens, with no memory of his past other than dreams about an organization known as WCKD. He hopes to escape by piecing together fragments of his past and clues he discovers in the labyrinth.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
programme.desc: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet. When a new threat capable of destroying the entire planet emerges, they must team up with a powerful faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to save Earth.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: The Pulse with Bill Anderson is a weekly tv program and podcast featuring topical discussions and interviews surrounding current local issues, events, and entertainment. Each week Bill will welcome guests from all walks of life to talk about the topics that have the attention of our community and beyond. The Pulse will air weekly on FOX 29 in Philly as well as FOX Soul nationwide and be distributed on all major podcast outlets. In addition to hosting The Pulse Bill also manages the content of the station's special reports, including the Our Race Reality series of segments and specials.
